ygData.subject: RE: Level 14 Spells
ygData.msgSnippet: Invis. to Undead. It s cheap and is extremely useful. Symbol of Transal is sweet, but for 7.5pp for the spell and 2-3g per reagent, not sure if it s worth it
ygData.messageBody:
Invis. to Undead. It's cheap and is extremely useful.
Symbol of Transal is sweet, but for 7.5pp for the spell and 2-3g per
reagent, not sure if it's worth it at your level.
Other than that, you might want to look into Cancel Magic.

Drizben D'vorn
Defiled Priest of Innoruuk

> From: Jeff Habermann <jrhabermann@...>
>
> Hello, I am a fist time poster. I just recently got to level 14. There
> are
> lot of nice spells for me to get. Of course i want them all, but being
> able
> to afford them is different story. I was able to buy: Bind Affinity,
> healing, Smite, and Expulse Dead, which others should i really try to get?
> Thank you.
>
> --Dandili
>
